Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25637 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 6.1.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-25637 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 6.1.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libvirt is earlier than 6.1.0-4, affected by CVE-2020-25637
